duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service to customers from around the world, offering accurate information and maintaining detailed records of damages and gas volume.
Welcome customers, record feedback, ensure personal belongings are collected, discreetly check for vehicle damage, and manage rental charges and receipts.
Advise on transportation options, complete service alerts for vehicle damage, and organize the lot for efficient access and traffic flow.
Work in outdoor weather conditions, perform other job duties as assigned, and communicate effectively with customers.
Manage stressful or unusual situations to maintain good customer service.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED, basic computer navigation skills, and knowledge of Microsoft Office applications.
